description: eggNOG (evolutionary genealogy of genes: Non-supervised Orthologous Groups) is a database of orthologous groups of genes. The orthologous groups are annotated with functional description lines (derived by identifying a common denominator for the genes based on their various annotations), with functional categories (i.e derived from the original COG/KOG categories).
name: eggNOG

resources.description: eggNOG Version 3 at European Molecular Biology Laboratory

institution.description: With 28 member states, EMBL has more than 110 independent research groups and service teams covering the spectrum of molecular biology at six sites in Barcelona, Grenoble, Hamburg, Heidelberg, EMBL-EBI Hinxton, and Rome.
institution.name: EMBL, Heidelberg

resources.name: eggNOG Version 3 at European Molecular Biology Laboratory
